Components #

The VueVentus component system comes with a variety of components preset with Tailwind CSS classes and props.

Configuration Components #

Review all the Configuration Components or drill down on them individually:

Palettes #

  • BorderDefault
  • ButtonOutline
  • ButtonSolid
  • GroundConsole
  • GroundDefault
  • GroundMonochromatic
  • GroundPastel
  • TextDefault
